content: Enable two-factor authentication for a more secure {{productName}} access for users.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining the benefits of enabling two-factor authentication in {{productName}}, which appears on a settings page or during a confirmation dialog. It helps users understand why two-factor authentication enhances security for accessing {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لحماية أكثر" (li himāyah akthar) translates to "for more protection" which is slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would emphasize enhanced security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تفعيل المصادقة ثنائية العوامل لزيادة أمان وصول المستخدمين لـ {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the spacing before and after the product name should be standardized. Consistency is key for a professional appearance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تفعيل المصادقة ثنائية العوامل لزيادة أمان وصول المستخدمين لـ {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a lowercase 'i' in 'İstifadəçilərə', which should be capitalized to match the English 'users'.

The translation 'pro bezpečnější přístup uživatelů do {{productName}}' could be improved. It translates to 'for a more secure access of users to {{productName}}'. A more natural Czech phrasing would be 'k {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Povolte dvoufázové ověřování pro bezpečnější přístup uživatelů k {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation maintains the double curly braces `{{productName}}` which might not be appropriate for all contexts. It's generally better to localize this separately or use a more platform-appropriate formatting (e.g., placeholders).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if `{{productName}}` needs to be localized separately or if a different placeholder format is preferable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'para que los usuarios tengan' is slightly awkward and less natural in Spanish. A more direct translation of 'for' would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Active la autenticación de dos factores para un acceso más seguro de los usuarios a {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) at the end of the sentence, which might be more appropriate for a title or a question rather than a descriptive sentence. A period (.) might be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Միացնել երկգործոն նույնականացումը՝ օգտատերերի համար ավելի ապահով {{productName}} մուտքի համար։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'より安全に{{productName}}にアクセスできるようになります' is a bit literal and slightly awkward. It translates to 'You will be able to access {{productName}} more safely.' A more natural Japanese phrasing would emphasize the security benefit for the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 二要素認証を有効にすることで、{{productName}}へのアクセスをより安全に保つことができます。(Ni yōso shōnin o yūko ni suru koto de, {{productName}} e no accessu o yori anzen ni tamotsu koto ga dekimasu.) - This translates to 'Enabling two-factor authentication allows you to keep access to {{productName}} secure.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "사용자의 보다 안전한 {{productName}} 액세스를 위해 이중 인증을 활성화하세요" is a bit formal and doesn't flow naturally. A more conversational and user-friendly phrasing would improve readability. While technically correct, it's not the best choice for a user-facing setting description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자의 {{productName}} 계정을 더욱 안전하게 보호하기 위해 이중 인증을 활성화하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Activați autentificarea cu doi factori pentru a securiza accesul tuturor utilizatorilor la {{productName}}' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow in Romanian. 'Securiza accesul' is less common than 'pentru o mai bună securitate a accesului'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați autentificarea cu doi factori pentru o mai bună securitate a accesului utilizatorilor la {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට' (parashreelayakinta) is a less common and potentially incorrect form. 'පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන්' (parashramakarawan) or simply 'පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන්ට' (parashramakaruwanta) would be more natural and accurate for 'users'.
The sentence structure 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට වඩාත් ආරක්‍ෂිතව {{productName}} වෙත ප්‍රවේශ වීමට' could be improved for better flow and clarity.  Consider rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන් {{productName}} වෙත ප්‍රවේශ වීමේ ආරක්ෂාව වැඩි කිරීමට ද්වි-සාධක සත්‍යාපනය සබල කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'аутентификацију' (authentication) should be written with a soft sign (ъ) in the middle. The correct spelling is 'аутентификацију'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући двофакторску аутентификацију (with ъ) за безбеднији {{productName}} приступ за кориснике.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kullanıcılar için daha güvenli bir {{productName}} erişimi için iki faktörlü kimlik doğrulamayı etkinleştirin.' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Turkish. A more common phrasing would emphasize the benefit to the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha güvenli bir {{productName}} deneyimi için iki faktörlü kimlik doğrulamayı etkinleştirin.
